name: The GOAT
description:
The GOAT is a game developed for the 1 Button Jam within the one-week time frame.

Due to the time Constraints and our High ambition, we fell short of the goal in the first published version.

In the next few days this will be heavily updated and fixed, as we have a lot of features already made, but not present in this release. Such as (More levels with increasing difficulty and other mechanics, Power ups, 3 unreleased animations, sound implementation, and end screen).

Stay tuned for the Updates :D
